data.title: Portfolio Website
data.description: Created a personal website to showcase my portfolio and be hosted online. Learned and used the Astro framework along the way.

data.title: Airline Optimization
data.description: Worked on a team of 6 to create a class project that utilizes Dijkstra's shortest path algorithm. Through a CLI, the user can load a graph of cities and carry out various functions related to airplane travel between them.

data.title: Employee Database
data.description: Worked on a team of 6 to create a class project that utilizes a Red-Black tree. Through a CLI, the user can load a CSV file of employees and carry out various functions related to analyzing the companyâ€™s employees.

data.title: Minesweeper Game
data.description: Clone of the popular Minesweeper game. Created as an introductory project to the Python language.
